metadata.title: CVE-2024-9397 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A missing delay in directory upload UI could have made it possible for anattacker to trick a user into granting permission via clickjacking. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 131, Firefox ESR < 128.3, Thunderbird <128.3, and Thunderbird < 131.

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
thunderbird package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
